member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.Common.PageAlignment
member.summary: Contains the information needed to align a Master Form (Form Template) page with the filled-in Form page image.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Common.PageAlignment.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of PageAlignment.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Common.PageAlignment.AlignOmrRectangle(Leadtools.LeadRect)
member.summary: Returns a LeadRect that is aligned to the form that has generated this PageAlignment.
member.param: The original LeadRect to align. This LeadRect should be in Master Form coordinates.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Common.PageAlignment.AlignRectangle(Leadtools.LeadRect)
member.summary: Returns a LeadRect that is aligned to the form that has generated this PageAlignment.
member.param: The original LeadRect to align. This LeadRect should be in Master Form coordinates.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.Common.PageProgressCallbackData
member.summary: Data for the PageProgressCallback delegate.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Common.PageProgressCallbackData.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of PageProgressCallbackData.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Common.PageProgressCallbackData.Percentage
member.summary: Gets the progress of the current operation, expressed as a percentage.
member.value: A value between 0 and 100 that represents the percent completion of the process.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.Common.FormProgressCallback
member.summary: Optional delegate method that reports the progress of a specific operation and offers the client an opportunity to cancel.
member.param: The 1-based index of the current page.
A value between 0 and 100 that represents the percent completion of the process.
member.returns: true to continue the process, false to cancel the process.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.Common.PageProgressCallback
member.summary: Monitors the progress of the form's page operations.
member.param: An instance of the PageProgressCallbackData interface containing the progress callback data.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.Common.FormsPageType
member.summary: Represents the Page type.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Common.FormsPageType.Normal
member.summary: Normal(General) page from a document, an invoice, or any other type of document that is not specified in any other members of the FormsPageType enumeration.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Common.FormsPageType.IDCard
member.summary: An ID card (For example, Driving License, Identification card, Library card, Passport, etc.)..

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Common.FormsPageType.Omr
member.summary: Optical mark recognition.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.Common.FormsRecognitionMethod
member.summary: Represents the Method used for recognition.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Common.FormsRecognitionMethod.Complex
member.summary: Complex Method that takes more time than the Simple Method, but can recognize almost all forms. This method is affected by which FormsTradeoffMode is selected in the Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.PageRecognitionOptions.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Common.FormsRecognitionMethod.Simple
member.summary: Simple method that takes less time than the Complex Method. Although it can recognize most forms passed to it, it cannot recognize forms that contain invoices.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.Common.FormsTradeoffMode
member.summary: Represents criteria values to use with the trade-off algorithm for recognition.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Common.FormsTradeoffMode.Accurate
member.summary: Highest accuracy mode. Used to recognize and process forms at any resolution.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Common.FormsTradeoffMode.Balanced
member.summary: High speed. Used to recognize and process forms that have resolutions similar to their master forms with moderate text.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Common.FormsTradeoffMode.Fast
member.summary: Highest speed. Used to recognize and process forms that have resolutions similar to their master forms with abundant text.
